title: EUNE still don't work?

replies.body:
Some EUNE players are still experiencing login issues. 

Drop a line with Riot’s [Technical Support Centre](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=34190)


* The primary category has already been chosen. 

* For the secondary category, select **I’m having issues on the PvP.Net Client**

https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-HCCc9VGLMBs/VvGim_HT2MI/AAAAAAAA5EU/CQi6aIgFrm0rtxw5hZl4Al3mMP3k3JAyg/s1600/Lissandra_Splash_3.jpg




[Need help obtaining logs? Soraka will be your aide! ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs)


https://static2.lolwallpapers.net/2016/04/57010692ced3c.jpg
They said me to wait... but I'm waiting about 7 days ...
In that case, take a break from League until Wednesday. Wednesday's the patch day and the login issue might be resolved then, if it's not, reopen the ticket and let them know.
same problem 10 days cant log in i try all fix nothing helps :( rinney how you now that neu patch coming on Wednesday??
and that HRT dont help so much {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
Yes this is Fix program from Riot
The 6.14 PBE Cycle ended on Friday which means 6.14 will be deployed to the live servers on Wednesday or Thursday this week.

While we don't have a permanent solution at the moment, [we've set up a post](http://boards.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-en/vIIOYAMo-updated-1648-03-07-16-eune-login-issues-02-07-16) on the EU boards to track this issue and provide updates along the way as we get them. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
